title: Laurie's Liberation
description: Laurie Franklin hoped to start a new life in the city of Stallbrook. There she met members of the Free Spirit Connection, including the handsome and charming Tony Graham, nephew of the city's police chief. Their provocative ideas, passionate convictions, and open eroticism awaken new thoughts and feelings in her, bringing her joy and love as she'd never known before. But what if her new friends found out her secret â€“ and worse, if one dangerous woman from her past tracks her down?
author: Rikki de la Vega
